Room.Name: Apothecary
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the apothecary of the Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: Did you ever wonder what might happen if you mixed a lot of different chemicals together, applied an intense heat over a prolonged time, and then had hundreds of magic spells cast in the vicinity of the cooking mess? Well, that's exactly what happened a couple of hundred years ago during the great battle that occurred here.
